name: David Ramirez
text: Yeah, you know, requiring us to follow international standards that we are party to by treaty is such a drag on sovereignty yall.    But letting the neighborhood bully like, crash on the couch, then claim property rights over the livingroom, that's totally cool.

source_obj.text: Yeah, you know, requiring us to follow international standards that we are party to by treaty is such a drag on sovereignty yall.    But letting the neighborhood bully like, crash on the couch, then claim property rights over the livingroom, that's totally cool.
